request.description: Register a new user. Role is optional and defaults to 'patient' if not provided. For multiple roles, use the role_names field with an array: ["patient", "doctor"]
Login a user and receive a JWT token.
Resend verification email to a user who hasn't verified their account yet. No authentication required.
Change user's password. Requires authentication.
Change user's phone number. Requires authentication.
Change user's email address. Requires authentication.
Request a password reset. No authentication required.
Register an admin user. Requires a valid admin token. This endpoint can only be used once to create the first admin user.
Update a user's profile information. Admin can update any user; users can only update their own profile.
Get the current patient's profile. Requires patient authentication.
Update the current patient's profile. Requires patient authentication.
List all patients. Requires admin authentication.
View a specific patient's details. Requires admin authentication.
List all doctors with optional filtering by specialty, availability, name, or location.
Get details of a specific doctor.

body.raw:
{
    "specialty": "Cardiology",
    "license_number": "MED12345",
    "experience_years": 10,
    "bio": "Board-certified cardiologist with 10 years of experience",
    "education": {
        "level_of_education": "Doctorate",
        "field": "Medicine",
        "institution": "Harvard Medical School",
        "start_date": "2005-09-01",
        "end_date": "2009-06-30"
    },
    "is_available": true,
    "communication_languages": "English, Spanish"
}

request.description: Add a doctor profile for the current user. Requires user authentication with doctor role. After creating a profile, an admin must verify the doctor.
Get the current doctor's profile. Requires authentication with doctor role.

body.raw:
{
    "username": "drsmith",
    "email": "drsmith@example.com",
    "password": "securedoctorpassword",
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Smith",
    "phone_number": "+1234567890",
    "address": "123 Doctor Street",
    "specialty": "Cardiology",
    "license_number": "MED12345",
    "experience_years": 10,
    "bio": "Board-certified cardiologist with 10 years of experience",
    "education": {
        "level_of_education": "Doctorate",
        "field": "Medicine",
        "institution": "Harvard Medical School",
        "start_date": "2005-09-01",
        "end_date": "2009-06-30"
    },
    "is_available": true
}

request.description: Admin: Add a new doctor. Requires admin authentication. Doctors created by admin are automatically verified.
Admin: List all doctors with optional filtering by verification status. Use is_verified=false to find doctors needing verification.
Admin: Verify a doctor's profile. Requires admin authentication. Set is_verified to true to approve or false to reject a doctor.
List healthcare facilities with optional filtering by category, name, or active status.
Get details of a specific healthcare facility.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "City General Hospital",
    "description": "A state-of-the-art general hospital",
    "category": "GENERAL",
    "address": "456 Hospital Road",
    "phone_number": "+1234567890",
    "email": "info@citygeneral.com",
    "website": "https://www.citygeneral.com",
    "is_verified": true,
    "is_active": true,
    "doctor_ids": [],
    "city": "New York",
    "state": "NY",
    "postal_code": "10001",
    "country": "USA"
}

request.description: Create a new healthcare facility. Requires admin authentication.
Assign a patient to a doctor. Requires admin or doctor authentication.
List appointments with optional filtering. Admin can see all; doctors see their appointments; patients see their appointments.
Create a new appointment. Patients can create for themselves; doctors and admins can create for any patient.
Get the current patient's appointments. Requires patient authentication.
Get the current doctor's appointments. Requires doctor authentication.
Cancel an appointment. Patients can cancel their own; doctors and admins can cancel any.
Update consultation details for an appointment. Requires doctor authentication.
Reschedule an appointment as a patient. Requires patient authentication and appointment ownership.
Reschedule an appointment as a doctor. Requires doctor authentication and appointment ownership.
List doctor availabilities with optional filtering by doctor ID, availability, day of week, or specific date.
Create a doctor availability slot. Doctors can create for themselves; admins can create for any doctor.
Get the current doctor's availability. Requires doctor authentication.
List consultations with optional filtering by appointment ID or status.
Create a new consultation. Requires doctor or admin authentication.
Start a consultation. Requires doctor authentication.
End a consultation. Requires doctor authentication.
List all available packages.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Premium Health Plan",
    "description": "Comprehensive healthcare package with unlimited consultations",
    "price": 299.99,
    "duration_days": 365,
    "consultation_count": -1,
    "max_doctors": 5,
    "priority_support": true,
    "access_to_resources": true,
    "is_active": true
}

request.description: Create a new package. Requires admin authentication.
List subscriptions with optional filtering. Admin can see all; patients see only their own.
Create a new subscription. Patients can create for themselves; admins can create for any patient.
Get the current patient's subscriptions. Requires patient authentication.
Cancel a subscription. Patients can cancel their own; admins can cancel any.

Submit a support request. Requires authentication. request_type must be one of: 'technical', 'billing', 'account', 'feedback', 'other'. priority can be: 'low', 'medium', 'high', 'urgent' (defaults to 'medium').
Send a general contact message. No authentication required.
Submit a rating for a doctor. Requires patient authentication. Rating must be between 1-5.
Get the average rating for a specific doctor.
Get all ratings for a specific doctor.
Get a summary of ratings for a specific doctor, including average rating and count by rating value.

request.description: Get clinical decision support based on symptoms and health metrics. Requires authentication.
Get patient's clinical history. Patients can access their own; doctors can access for assigned patients.
Get FHIR server capability statement.
List patients in FHIR format.
Get patient details in FHIR format.
List doctors in FHIR format.
Get doctor details in FHIR format.
List healthcare facilities in FHIR format.
Get healthcare facility details in FHIR format.
